titleStmt.title: [O Vtinam 1 For Queene Elizabeths securitie, 2 for hir subiects prosperitie, ...]
titleStmt.author: Davies, John, Sir, 1569-1626.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by R. Yardley and P[eter] Short, for I. Pennie,

notesStmt.note: A3r caption title reads: To the most noble, famous, renowmed, inuincible and victorious realme of England: be all flourishing felicitie, happie prosperitie, and matchles tranquilitie longe to endure.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
